meanings.definition: A person who strongly supports a monarch or royal family to an extreme degree.
meanings.sent1: The ultraroyalist always waved flags in support of the king.
meanings.sent2: The ultraroyalist attended every royal event with unwavering loyalty.
meanings.sent3: The ultraroyalist joked that they would only bow to the king in their dreams.
meanings.sent4: She was an ultraroyalist, seeing the king as the sun and herself as a loyal subject.
meanings.sent5: The ultraroyalist's dedication to the royal family was unmatched.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to extreme support for a monarch or royal family.
meanings.sent1: The ultraroyalist painting in the palace was admired by all.
meanings.sent2: Her ultraroyalist views were evident in her ornate crown collection.
meanings.sent3: The ultraroyalist decor in the room made it feel like a royal chamber.
meanings.sent4: The ultraroyalist garden bloomed with flowers fit for a king.
meanings.sent5: The ultraroyalist celebrations were grand and majestic.
